history.narrative: Law 18-202, the “Job Growth Incentive Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-658, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 20, 2010, and May 4, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 21, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-414 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-202 became effective on July 27, 2010.
